title: Thief Gold (GOG)
description:
About the game:
================Having received training from an enigmatic organization known as the Keepers, Garrett leaves the order and goes back to the life of a thief on the streets of the City. Once you enter the underworld you have to deal with all the consequences - you are not the only one out there looking for decent loot. Hide in the shadows of the dark, savage city. Sneak into old ruins, haunted cathedrals and mansions of the rich. Incapacitate your enemies quietly or in an open fight. This unique sneak-em-up game provides you with a range of means to achieve your goal. Remember though - secrecy is your best friend.

THIEFÃ¢â€žÂ¢ GOLD is a first-person perspective stealth game. It was the first game to use light and sound gameplay mechanics Ã¢â‚¬â€œ different surfaces cause varying noise (for example carpets are quiet and ceramic tiles are very loud). You can use sound to your advantage - itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not only your main source of information on how close your enemies are but you can use it to distract them, for example by throwing objects. With unscripted levels, and objectives and paths altered based on difficulty settings, THIEFÃ¢â€žÂ¢ GOLD can give you hours of non-repetitive gameplay.


Features:
==========
THIEFÃ¢â€žÂ¢ GOLD includes THIEFÃ¢â€žÂ¢ THE DARK PROJECT and the GOLD update (three new campaign missions which deepen the plot and five new types of enemies).
An immersive stealth experience from a first person perspective, allowing direct confrontation if desired.
Pioneer of the stealth game genre for the PC and the first game to use light and sound gameplay mechanics.
Unique atmosphere of tension powered by ubiquitous darkness and suspense.


Version:
=========
Latest game version as of today or GOG setup 2.0.3.49 (after applied patch)


Instructions:
==============Run Setup and Install (don't run before patching)
Run Patch and Update
Play - Enjoy - Seed!


Essential improvements:
========================Mod versions are the newest as of today. 
1. Read this page for info, and if there is no newer release, then install TFix_1.22.exe from my torrent
2. Read this page for info, and if there is no newer release, then copy ep2.crf (Enhancement Pack 2.0) from my torrent into install dir and modify mod_path in cam_mod.ini to look like this 
"mod_path ep2thief1+ep2" (Note: this mod is used for both Thief 1 and 2)
Done! Play

If you want to just downgrade Thief Gold to the original Thief The Dark Project? Then go here

TIP: Skip intro videos:
Go into the MOVIES folder where the game is installed.
Delete or rename INTRO.AVI.
The game will now go directly to the main menu.



System Requirements:
=====================
Processor: 1.8 GHz 
Video card: 3D card compatible with DX7 (DX9 recommended)
System memory: 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended)
Operating system: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
Hard disk drive: 2 GB available space 




            If you enjoyed the game then share with others by seeding
                         Remember to support quality games
